description:
If you are a music producer/songwriter/marketer who has music to market and wants to make original, trendy, and eye-catching music videos without having to film a thing, this is the course for you.

In this course you will learn:

  • How to take existing video footage and mangle it into a completely original and awesome looking video element for your videos
  • How to use easily pro-level video editing software to make perfectly synced videos to your music
  • How to create and manipulate text so that your message or artist name can be prominently and creatively in peoples faces
  • How to animate elements so that your videos are dynamic and never boring
  • How to use colors and blend, merge and transform them as your video goes on
  • How to wow people with amazing videos that accompany your music
It's a straightforward course presented in a way that is NOT boring. You just have to do one thing: follow each video step by step, and by the end you will have the skills to make totally custom video for all your music.
title: Make Awesome Music Videos Without Filming a Thing
